manager
Class RunManager

java.lang.Object
  manager.RunManager

public final class RunManager
extends java.lang.Object

This is a class (singleton) for run control. The following (user implemented) classes must be given to the Initialize method: - RunAction - EventAction - PrimaryGeneratorAction

Version:
0.1 NB This is the only class which MUST be instantiated in the main()
Author:
Mario Alemi

Initialise the RunManager, it must be called only once.

Parameters:
myRunAction - set the user's RunAction
myEventAction - set the user's EventAction
storeDir - database's directory

RunSimulation

public void RunSimulation(int nEvents)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
RunSimulation The actual simulation takes place here.

Parameters:
nEvents - The number of events involved in the simulation
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - if RunManager has not been initialized.
